name: Spoonful
description:
On your daily quest of finding food you, a little ladybug, unwillingly joined the breakfast of a young human by getting stuck in one of his Froot Loop. Can you survive until his hunger is satisfied?

Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Eat (Speed up) / Climb on Loop

You can eat 4 times of the froot loop you are sitting in. Once its gone you need to get a new one in 5 seconds or you will drown :(

Objective:
Survive until there are no loops to escape the bowl
